breakfast.name: Vegan Polenta with Roasted Vegetables
breakfast.preparation: Cook polenta according to package directions using vegetable broth. Roast chopped vegetables with olive oil, garlic, salt, and pepper until tender. Top polenta with roasted vegetables and fresh basil. Sprinkle with nutritional yeast if desired.
breakfast.nutritionalBenefits: Provides complex carbohydrates, fiber, vitamins, and antioxidants. Good source of energy for weight gain.
breakfast.healthNotes: Easy to digest. Choose gluten-free polenta if necessary. Roasting vegetables enhances their flavor and digestibility, important for liver health.

lunch.name: Lentil Bolognese with Whole Wheat Pasta
lunch.preparation: Sauté onion, carrot, and celery in olive oil. Add garlic and lentils and cook for a few minutes. Stir in crushed tomatoes, vegetable broth, oregano, basil, bay leaf, salt, and pepper. Simmer until lentils are tender. Cook pasta according to package directions. Serve lentil bolognese over pasta. Sprinkle with nutritional yeast if desired.
lunch.nutritionalBenefits: Rich in protein, fiber, and iron. Provides sustained energy release and promotes muscle growth. Whole wheat pasta adds complex carbohydrates.
lunch.healthNotes: Lentils are a good source of plant-based protein and are generally well-tolerated. Avoid adding excessive amounts of oil.  This meal is helpful for liver health as it's rich in fiber which helps detoxify the body.

dinner.name: Vegan Mushroom Risotto
dinner.preparation: Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil. Add rice and cook for a minute. Add white wine (if using) and let it evaporate. Gradually add warm vegetable broth, stirring constantly, until rice is creamy and cooked through. Sauté mushrooms in olive oil until tender. Stir mushrooms into risotto. Garnish with vegan parmesan cheese and fresh parsley. Season with salt and pepper.
dinner.nutritionalBenefits: Provides carbohydrates for energy and essential nutrients from mushrooms. Offers a satisfying and flavorful meal.
dinner.healthNotes: Ensure the rice is cooked thoroughly.  Use low-sodium vegetable broth to minimize sodium intake, which is important for maintaining liver health. The mushrooms also add valuable nutrients

snacks.name: Avocado Toast with Hemp Seeds
snacks.preparation: Toast bread. Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Spread avocado on toast and sprinkle with hemp seeds.
snacks.nutritionalBenefits: Healthy fats, protein, and fiber. Provides a quick energy boost.
snacks.healthNotes: Avocado is a good source of healthy fats. Hemp seeds provide protein and omega-3 fatty acids.
